name: Maltodextrin
description: A highly processed carbohydrate that can cause blood sugar spikes.

name: MSG (Monosodium Glutamate)
description: Enhances flavor but may cause headaches and other symptoms.

name: Sodium Benzoate
description: A preservative that may form harmful benzene under certain conditions.

name: Artificial Colors
description: Linked to hyperactivity in children and potential allergic reactions.

name: Artificial Sweeteners
description: Can disrupt gut bacteria and increase sugar cravings.

name: Hydrogenated Oils
description: Contain trans fats that increase heart disease risk.
